title: Belarusian club fill stadium with mannequins as league continues
description: Virtual online tickets, cut-out portraits and mannequins - one Belarusian football club are using mannequins to fill empty stands during the coronavirus crisis.
content:
Dynamo Brest have welcomed virtual fans from around the world to support their team during the coronavirus crisis
Virtual online tickets, cut-out portraits and mannequins - one Belarusian football club have come up with a new way to fill empty stands during … [+2289 chars]
